title: I pad stolen from car right outside hotel door unloading luggage!!!!!!
review: A good located Hotel with very helpful personel ! It is only a 10 minute walk to the center oft the town. The rooms are very comfortable and if you have a car, the parking area is next to the Hotel and protected. The only minus is the breakfast. It is not that good, as expected from such a good Hotel.

title: Well located.
review: Many thanks for time spent for this review and many thanks also for the nice words you wrote about our hotel and our services; we are really happy when our Clients enjoyed their stay with us and we hope to welcome you again at the Grand Hotel Adriatico. Warm regards. Daniele Benelli Assistant Manager

title: Location, location, location.
review: This was our last night of a short & wonderful visit to Tuscany & the Cinque Terre. Since our flight left early next morning, we choose this hotel due to its location.Unfortunately it was not a good experience and ruined our last evening in Florence. We parked briefly in front of this 4 star hotel to unload our luggage before parking the car at the garage around the corner. During this very short period, while literally moving the suitcases to the curb in front of the hotel door, our i pad was stolen from the front seat of the car (which had most of our vacation pictures) This is the only place it could have happened and unfortunately we didn't realize it until after we had checked in.The hotel staff were totally unhelpful, had a matter of fact, formal attitude and completely…

title: Kindness of the Staff Extended to a non Florence Best Western Customer
review: Dear Sirs, first, I am very sorry for the theft of your I pad, especially because there were the memories of your holiday. As You have written your car was parked on the street and not in our parking lot and it was therefore not under our direct responsibility. Surely you could also be more careful as the thieves live everywhere. My colleagues on duty, with whom I have talked, explained to me what happened and they confirmed to me that they tried to make you understand immediately that the police or Carabinieri would never have occurred to a simple theft here in hotel but that you  had to go directly to their offices for the declaration (of course is no possible to make it per phone, as you asked many times). Among other things, the Carabinieri are located at only two minute walk from our hotel. I apologize again for all the troubles you had here in Florence and please accept our best regards.   Daniele Benelli   Assistant Manager

title: Florence Experience
review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. title: Cold and unhelpful
review: We had 5 nights at this hotel.  It was conveniently located and within a short walk to the main sights.  The room was very clean, well serviced, fairly large and quiet enough to rest.  The bathroom facilities were great.  Breakfast was nice with a reasonable selection and staff were friendly.  The reception staff were professional and friendly and provided guidance and assistance in the booking of tours.  The hotel is only a few minutes away from the river and a short walk to the Ponte Vecchio.  Of major importance it is only 5 minutes away from the train station and therefore, you are able to walk comfortably with luggage to and from the hotel or station.  A good location and I would stay again

title: Excellent location and value for money
review: Many thanks for your kind and detailed review, it's really a pleasure for us read that you enjoied your stay at our hotel. Hoping to welcome you again at the Grand Hotel Adriatico, please accept our best regards.     Daniele Benelli      Assistant Manager

title: Good location
review: WeI recently spent 2 days in Florence and stayed at the Hotel Adriatico.  The staff were rather unfriendly from the start, they didn't even help with advice on a tour of the city so we had to make our own way and the proximity of the hotel to the historic centre was helpful. The room was decorated in dark warm colours and had very little daylight. The AC was satisfactory, so was the bathroom. The breakfast had a good continental selection but what was weird was that it had 5 jam dispensers, all bust, and nobody cared! We also dined at the Opera Restaurant of the hotel which is also open to non residents BUT we were the only people there!! The cherry on the cake was that on checking out, the receptionist was on the phone for 30 minutes talking to someone while we waited to pay…

title: Great location
review: The hotel is very well located . Its a short 5 minute walk away from the main train station of florence and is particularly convenient if you are arriving into town by train or taking day tours that start from the station.The access route is through small lanes but that is typical of whole of florence. The hotel is neat, the rooms are comfortable and the staff speaks english and is very helpful. There are plenty of small cafes,kebab shops,pizzerias and gelato shops within 5 minutes. There is also the added convenience of a car rental ,travel agency and public laundromat within arms reach. You can practically walk to the duomo, the ponte viccheo and central town attractions and cover the main sight seeing points on foot from here. It was totally worth the money. One small note…

title: Can't fault, ideal for a short stay
review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. Commuters and tourists come across the constant hustle and bustle of the station before exiting, taking a few steps and stopping amazed in Piazza di Santa Maria Novella. title: Great Hotel
review: We used this hotel for an overnight stay in Florence and it was just great. A short 5 minute walk from the train station and there it was. The hotel is central with a 10/15 minute walk to the centre. It is situated down side streets and not on a main road as I had imagined but seemed a safe enough area. Reception friendly and helpful, bedroom large, clean and modern and we slept well in the quiet room. Breakfast good - have no complaints at all.

title: excellent hotel in the heart of Florence
review: It's wonderful for us to read reviews as your and we really are very proud about it. Many thanks for the time spent and for the nice words. Hoping to welcome you again at the Grand Hotel Adriaitico, please accept our best regards.     Daniele Benelli      Assistant Manager

title: great hotel
review: We arrived at our hotel after midnight due to flight delays.  We found the hotel easy to get to when our coach dropped us at the train station and on arrival the gentleman dealt with our booking in quickly and politely.  Our room 526 was well maintained, had everything we could possibly need for our stay and the bed was very comfortable and immaculately clean.  The air conditioning in the room was very welcome, especially when you have been walking for hours seeing the sights and need to cool down and rest.  There was a good selection for breakfast which was self service and neither me or my husband had any complaints.  We found the hotel to be in the perfect position to see all that Florence had to offer and walking around this beautiful city was an absolute pleasure.  We will…

title: Great location in the city
review: Many thanks for the time spent for this review which is really important for us. Thanks a lot for the kind words and I hope to welcome you again here at the Best Western Grand Hotel Adriatico. Best regards, Daniele Benelli Assistant Manager

title: Decent Hotel in a Quiet Location
review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. Commuters and tourists come across the constant hustle and bustle of the station before exiting, taking a few steps and stopping amazed in Piazza di Santa Maria Novella. title: Decent and Accessible Hotel
review: As a Best Western Hotel, this is a good place to stay in Florence.  All the museums and other interesting places are within walking distance with plenty of small restaurants and stores close to the hotel.  The room we stayed in was spacious and the breakfast was good.  The shower had a partial, fixed door - not closing all the way - which caused water to spill outside.  I had not experienced this anywhere!  Water pressure for the toilet tank was so low that I had to wait for the tank to fill - not a pleasant experience!  Although there are three elevators, two of them can barely hold two people and their luggage and the third one was only slightly better.  Other than these, the stay was good and we would definitely stay there again.

title: Not good
review: Thanks a lot for the time spent for this review and also for the kind words; it's important for us to know our Client's opinions and we appreciate when they liked our hotel and our services. Hoping to see you again at the Grand Hotel Adriatico, please accept our best regards. Daniele Benelli Assistant Manager

title: Nice surprise...
review: Hotel Grand Adriatico is a 5 minute walk from the train station, but a 25 minute walk from the main city center, and sightseeing spots. There are lots of restaurants and shops close by to the hotel. The rooms are really spacious for 4 people, with 2 separate rooms, but the décor is a little outdated and old fashioned. Their front staff is really helpful and friendly which made the experience there even better! Decent hotel, but not that close to the main attractions in Florence.

title: Very good hotel
review: Many thanks for your kind review which is really important for us but I do not agree with you when you tell that our hotel is located 25 minutes walking from the main attractions: the churg and the square of Santa Maria Novella are at 5 minutes walking, from our Hotel; the Duomo, the churgh of San Lorenzo with the square and Ponte Vecchio are 10 minutes walking, and Palazzo Pitti 12 minutes walking away !!! Hoping to welcome you at the Grand Hotel Adriatico and in Florence again, please accept our best regards.     Daniele Benelli     Assistant Manager

title: What a nice surprise
review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. title: For sure I would stay here again
review: I chose this hotel because of the close location to both the train station and the historical sights of Florence.  Very easy walk to get from the Train Station to the Hotel.  Staff was very knowledgeable and friendly at all of our interactions.  The Breakfast room was open and full of light.  Great way to start your day.  Very close access to all of the major attractions in Florence.  Our room was much more modern than I was expecting with nice hardwood floors and a great shower.  There was no tub, but that didn't cause a problem.  Now that we've been able to compare quite a few hotels from our recent trip to Europe, this is one that we certainly would book again.

title: Great hotel in a great location
review: We are really happy to read that we are able to surprise our Guests as we work hard to obtain this. Many thanks for the nice words spent about your stay in our hotel and I hope you to welcome you again at the Grand Hotel Adriaitico. Best regards.    Daniele Benelli   Assistant Manager

title: Modern hotel in historic Venice
review: I stayed here for 4 nights with my wife and we loved it. Barely 5-7 minutes away from the train station and not to far from the main places. Very easy breezy. You also have so many mini supermarkets neat the hotel. The staff were awesome ! This lady at the reception was able to book us a your at 10:30pm for a tour leaving at 7:15 the next morning. She called and worked her magic. Only 4 things were a bit off for me was the wifi in the room was slow and the bidet in the washroom, half shower door ( which water was going everywhere ) and the pillows were rock solid BUT not the end of the world. I would give this hotel a overall ( clean,location,staff ) 9/10

title: Grand Indeed
review: Many thanks for your nice and complete review which is really important for us. Concerning the pillows we have a pillows menu in the rooms with 4 different types of pillows for our Giuests and you could ask us at the front desk and the same thing for the shower, Hoping to welcome you again at the Grand Hotel Adriatico, please accept our best regards.   Daniele Benelli    Assistant Manager

title: perfect location, clean rooms and breakfast included
review: Very close to train station and all the tourist attractions. Clean rooms with good service. Breakfast was okay - not many options for vegetarian which is generally the case across Italy. We stayed there for 2 nights and would definitely stay again.

title: Nice Property. Good Location
review: Many thanks for the time spent for writing this review and many thanks also for the wonderful comment. It's really important for us to read the impressions of our Clients and when we saw that our hotel, our services and all our work are appreciated, we are really proud of it. Hoping to welcome you again at the Grand Hotel Adriatico, please accept our best regards. Daniele Benelli Assistant Manager

title: Stay in best western grand hotel Adriatico, Florence
review: It is less than 10 minute walk from the train station which was wonderful when exhausted from traveling and carrying bags, 20 Euro cab ride from the airport, and it is 5-15 minutes from everything worth seeing in Florence. Very friendly staff, they even printed tickets for us via email that we needed for our next city. We were quite happy overall.

title: Other than location nothing good about it
review: Many thanks for your kind review which is really important for us. We are very proud when we see that our Clients enjoyed their stay at our hotel as you and I hope to welcome you again at the Grand Hotel Adriatico. Best regards.   Daniele Benelli    Assistant Manager

title: Best Western remains a trusted chain
review: This is a nice hotels with great rooms.The pics of the rooms on the website do not do justice.  The staff on the front desk is very helpful. However, watch out for the elderly sourly waiter at breakfast. The downside of this hotel is the maître de at the restaurant Oscar. Arrogant to say the least. Other than that, great value for your Euro.

title: Not a hotel for individual tourists. Rude behavior in breakfast area.
review: Many thanks for your kind review which is really important for us. We don't have a maitre called Oscar in our restaurant I do not know who you're talking about. Hoping to ewlcome yu again at the Grand Hotel Adriaitco, please accept our best regards.    Daniele Benelli    Assistant Manager

title: Great hotel
review: Hotel was very good, would have stayed longer if we could have, clean rooms and bathrooms, reasonable size, excellent breakfast and close to centre of Florence, only down side is hard beds and pillows.

title: Excellent hotel in Florence
review: Many thanks for this nice review which is important for us; concerning the beds we have orthopedic mattresses in our rooms but we have available also some soft mattresses and you could ask at the reception; the same thing for the pillows as in all our rooms there is a pillows menu which is much appreciated by our customers  Hoping to see you again in Florence and at our Hotel, please accept our best regards.    Daniele Benelli     Assistant Manager

title: 2 nights in Firenze
review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. title: Unpleasant
review: Well situated for the stations (train and bus) and just off the river so easy access to the bridges (Ponte Vecchio etc).  Nice room, don't use wifi as last time I did (elsewhere) my email account was hacked.  Friendly helpful staff and we had a couple of good breakfasts.  Loads of good restaurants to eat at all in walking distance.  Nothing special from the outside but nicely appointed inside.  Recommended

title: Typical European Hotel, Location was not the most convenient
review: Many thanks for your nice and complte review;  your opinion it's always important for us and in this case it confirm that our Guests appreciate our hotel and all our services. Hoping to see you again at the Grand Hotel Adriatico, please accept all our best regards. Daniele Benelli Assistant Manager

title: Hotel Adriatico Florence
review: The experience was overall unpleasant. Small rooms painted in orange/red with AC limited temperature. The staff quite unhelpful and abrupt, not what we expected. We were charged different rates of what was initially agreed, the difference being up to 90 euro per day, also charged a 30 euro for breakfast even thought we didn't have it there every day. The area is close enough to the centre however it gives you an unsafe feeling.   We do not recommend this hotel unless you are desperate for a room in Florence.

title: Not a very good experience
review: Out of all the hotels on my trip this one was probably the one at the bottom of the list. I would rate it as average. Especially considering the cost was not the lowest on the list. So I expected a bit more out of the hotel.  The rooms were small especially after the large one we had in Rome (which I know is not normal). We had a triple room which meant a single bedroom with two twin beds put together and a little cubby at the entrance to the room for a couch as the third bed. This third bed was right next to the door that attaches to the adjacent room. That door was a single wooden door so that meant I could hear people in the other room talking from my couch bed. Luckily they were not too loud at night. It was clean and well kept though.  For the location it is about a 10 min…

title: Good well run hotel
review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. title: Great clean hotel....Great Location
review: On the plus side, the hotel is clean, well maintained, and the staff are efficient and friendly. The  breakfast buffet is standard contiinental but is still  well managed with plenty of staff around. One the not so positive side, there is  a cinema is straight accross from the hotel entrance, which gets a bit frantic at weekends with late night viewings- mid week seems all right. Overall, location is great for bus/train station (would recommend bus from Pisa airport) and city centre attractions.

title: Very nice hotel with a good location to the train station
review: Many thanks for your nice review wich is really important for us and many thanks also for the nice words. Hoping to welcome you again at the Grand Hotel Adriatico, please accept our best regards.    Daniele Benelli    Assistant Manager

title: Bit lame for a 4 star
review: Great hotel....Fully Air conditioned rooms.....Real nice furnishings (look brand new)...bed was very comfortable....very quiet   Great location close to river & Ponte Vechio.  Restaurant served great food with a real nice buffet breakfast

title: Good value
review: Many many thanks for this short but enthusiastic review, it's nice to see that you had a really good impression about our hotel. Your review is important for us to try to improve all our services. Hoping to see you again at our hotel please accept our best regards. Daniele Benelli Assistant Manager

title: Pity - poor sound insulation
review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. title: No air conditioning
review: I have mixed feelings about this hotel because most aspects are absolutely ok, even surprisingly for a touristic spot with a very high turnover of guests: - nice service and caring people - very very clean - good central position also very close to train station - comfy beds, super-clean sheets and nice bathrooms - we were also given our room at 10.30 am, much in advance on the official check-in time, which was much appreciated.  But unfortunately our room (107) was almost "shared" with our neighbours at 108. They were not particularly noisy or uneducated people, but the non-existing sound proofing between rooms, and also the plumbing noise when they had shower or used water made our night terrible and very un-private. I understand the building itself is old, and that it is…

title: Remarkably convenient
review: This is a very expensive hotel especially since the AC was not working. During our 2 day stay we reported the lack of AC at least 4 times. Why stay in a hotel that is too hot to sleep? Someone came to our room and said it was controlled by a computer at the front desk. Every time we asked we were told it would be on in 5 minutes. It did not come on. Poor service while paying a lot of money. If you decide to stay bring a fan.

title: Too expensive
review: This was my second stay at Grand Hotel Adriatico.  My wife and I found ourselves despatched to the seventh floor, right up in the attic.  We had terrific views of the Duomo, Campanile, Settignano and Fiesole, a complete but very pleasant surprise.  Our room was also wonderfully quiet, comfortable and spacious.  The only minor problem we face was that the small lifts only reached the sixth floor leaving us with a tiny climb up stairs, or alternatively taking the larger lift that reached our floor but was sometimes filled with luggage by porters, and the breakfast room which was squeezy and sometimes mildly chaotic, though the bacon was tasty!  Best of all, this hotel is fantastically convenient, for the railway station, for the river, for the city centre, for San Lorenzo and for…

title: Good hotel well located
review: Many thanks for this complete and nice review which is really important for us. We are very proud when our Clients enjoyed their stay with us and they liked our hotel and our services. Hoping to welcome you again another time at the Best Western Grand Hotel Adriatico, please accept our best regards.   Daniele Benelli    Assistant Manager

review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. title: Excelent stay
review: The hotel is located approx. 4-5 mins walking from the Train station and coming from Venice, we found the rooms to be pretty big and nice. The staff at the front desk was really friendly and explained all the must-do sights of Florence on the map and also the transport options. Service was great and so was breakfast. Overall a great stay! Their restaurant too is not that bad, but I would recommend that, only as a backup plan, because there are plenty of great options within walking distance of the hotel.

title: Conveniently located and great breakfast!
review: Many thanks for your wonderful review which is really important for my staff and me. We love to read when our Clients loved thei stay with us. Hoping to welcome you again at the Grand Hotel Adriatico, please accept our best regards.    Daniele Benelli     Assistant Manager

title: Convenient location
review: From my point of view this hotel can not be rated. It has a better quality comparing with Excellent rating. The lobby was huge and luxury and the staff from the front desk was really helpful. The breakfast was really good, more food than you can actually eat and the waiters very nice. The room was big enough, really clean and with new furniture. I had an excellent sleep here.  In a word it was EXTRAORDINARY.

title: Great Location
review: Many thanks for the nice and complete review which is really important for us. We are happy to read that you enjoyed your stay with us and appreciate our hotel and all our services. Hoping to welcome you again at the Grand Hotel Adriatico, please accept our best regards. Daniele Benelli Assistant Manager

title: Old but not too bad...
review: Great location within walking distance of everything - just out of restricted driving zone so is easy to approach from river side - secure parking 20 euro per night - room was large and very clean and very quiet at night - staff very helpful with tips on places to see - brand new conad supermarket just around corner - breakfast was plentiful with huge choice - just get there early before the tour groups descend on breakfast - would stay again for sure

title: Clean, spacious rooms but...
review: Many thanks for the nice and complete review which is really important for us. We are happy to read that you enjoyed your stay with us and appreciate our hotel and all our services. Hoping to welcome you again at the Grand Hotel Adriatico, please accept our best regards.              Daniele Benelli   Assistant Manager

title: Beware the double room supplement
review: Adriatico is dated but good value for the location.  It's not too far to walk to the center and all the sites.  It serves as an okay place to sleep while taking in the Florence experience.  With all the good food in Florence and market, do not eat at the hotel.

title: Good location, nice room, terrible breakfast
review: ...but too warm for sleeping if you are there before the tourist season starts.  They won't turn on the air until then.  Opening the windows is fine, but the noise from the outside will keep you awake, especially when the movie theater lets out.  Free wi-fi, nice bar/lounge area.  Beware of the safe - there's an extra step to activating it.  If you can't get back into it, you'll have to wait until the next morning for the head housekeeper to come and open it.

title: Nice situation, very nice service and good value for money
review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. Commuters and tourists come across the constant hustle and bustle of the station before exiting, taking a few steps and stopping amazed in Piazza di Santa Maria Novella. title: Good value hotel near train station
review: The hotel is located in the heart of the city while being in a quiet street. All the "must see" are within a short walking distance. The rooms are spacious with nice furniture and very clean.  The buffet breakfast has everything you typically expect for such kind of hotels. And last but not least, the staff is very committed to make your stay a great experience. A special mention to Daniele, the manager's assistant.  For sure an hotel that I do recommend whatever the purpose of your stay is.

title: Excellent hotel in the Centre of Florence by the Rail Station
review: Thanks a lot for this wonderful rerview which is really important for us, we are really happy ro read that our Clients enjoyed their stay in our hotel and enjoyed all our services. I hope to welcome you again at the Grand Hotel Adriatico and please accept our my best reagrds. Daniele Benelli    Assistant Manager

title: Behaviors
review: Stayed here with a friend, we flew into Florence airport which was around 15mins away by taxi cost around €30 the hotel is situated 5 mins away from train station (if you feel like venturing out) 5 min walk opposite direction takes you to the beautiful river. It's around a 15min walk to the centre. There are buses but as centre is mostly pedestrianised we walked everywhere such a beautiful city it's well worth the effort. When we checked in were given map & leaflets with info on centre & attractions. Breakfast was OK selection of cereals, fruit & pastries. There are shops nearby for drinks/snacks & restaurants we ate at restaurant opposite 2 nights very nice pasta & pizza! Wouldn't hesitate in coming back to this hotel

title: Good value for money
review: Many thanks at first for the time spent for this review and many thanks also for the great review; we are really happy to read that you liked your stay at our Hotel and you liked also all our services. I hope to welcome you again at the Grand Hotel Adriatico. With warm regards. Daniele Benelli Assistant Manager

title: Not a bad choice
review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. title: Decent option for Florence
review: Nice enough hotel in a good location and only a 10-15 minute walk from the Duomo. At first it seems a bit dated but it has a certain charm that grows on you. We had a room on the 7th floor which was comfortable and quiet, had good views and was kept spotlessly clean. Wi-Fi in room was fast but intermittent as they’ve only just installed it in all rooms so I imagine they were having a few teething problems. Breakfast is reasonable with a fairly good selection but nothing special. Staff very helpful and pleasant including a charming elderly barman but prices in the bar a bit steep at 9 euros for a G&T. They do a Happy Hour between 5-7pm when drinks are half price. Some decent restaurants and the river within a few minutes’ walk. In a city like Florence you're not going to spend…

title: Clean and quiet
review: Many thanks for time spent for this review and many thanks also for the nice words you wrote about our hotel and our services; we are really happy when our Clients enjoyed their stay with us and we hope to welcome you again at the Grand Hotel Adriatico. Warm regards. Daniele Benelli      Assistant Manager

title: Clean and nice hotel
review: I stayed here in September 2013 when I was in Italy for business. The hotel was recommended by some of the Italians that I was working with. It was also a very short walk from the train station.  Positives •	For Florence the hotel was reasonably priced •	The room I had was pretty large •	The breakfast at the hotel was reasonable  Negatives •	The hotel is a little bit outside the main tourist areas (10 to 15 minute walk from Palazzo Vecchio. •	Certain areas/furniture of the hotel looked a little old fashioned and could do with updating •	Wi-Fi is an additional cost. This was advertised on as free on the website I booked it through. The hotel eventually gave it to me for free  Would I stay here again? Possibly. The first two negatives are very minor. However, the wi-fi is…

title: solid 4 out of 5, quiet, good location & nice breakfast
review: Many thanks for this review which is really important for us and many thanks also for your detailed analysis. Concerning the wifi, starting from the 1st of January 2014 it's available and free of charge in all our hotel, also in the rooms, asking the password at the front desk; we are located in the center of Florence, less than 10 minutes walking from the Duomo and from the Ponte Vecchio, in an elegant area of Florence at only five minutes walking from the mail railway station of Santa Maria Novella. Hoping to welcome you again at the Grand Hotel Adriatico, please accept our best regards.   Daniele Benelli     Assistant Manager

title: A good city hotel
review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. Commuters and tourists come across the constant hustle and bustle of the station before exiting, taking a few steps and stopping amazed in Piazza di Santa Maria Novella. title: an incident
review: Well clean and cozy rooms. Clean bathroom but a little old.. The breakfast is very good, with outside garden to drink your coffee and you can smoke. Generally good prices per night. The internet is charged expensive ...!  ( This should be finished sometime at all BW hotels .... ) Good location for getting around the city and just 150 m from the central  railway station "Santa Maria Novella" .

title: Friendly, clean and well equipped hotel in good location
review: Many thanks for this nice review  and I'm glad to confirm that starting from the 1st of January 2014 wi fi will be working, free of charge, in all our hotel. Hoping to welcome you again at the Grand Hotel Adriatico please accept our best regards.     Daniele Benelli    Assistant Manager

title: Stay somewhere else!
review: Location is pretty good. This hotel is near gorgeous Santa Maria Novella within walking distance to all the major attractions. But unfortunately we got stolen our bag in the hotel restaurant during breakfast. We don't want to believe, but it seemed that there was a thief watching for a chance to snatch someone's bag hanging on chairs. There were waiters and other guests in the restaurant at that time, but our bag was stolen in a very short moment. Although it is 4 stars-hotel, there were no CCTVs at all, so we could not identify what was happening in the restaurant at all, as a result it became almost impossible to refind our bag which included our passports, quite a lot amount of euros and credit cards as well. We think the hotel restaurant should keep the entrance thoroughly,…

title: David slept here
review: I've just stayed here for two weeks, primarily for business but my daughter joined me and had a vacation. The hotel staff are great, very keen to help and speak good english.  Breakfast is extensive: I don't eat the bacon and scrambled eggs so can't comment on the reviews from others, but there is a wide selection of cereal, bread,  cheeses and meat, fruit and pastries so just be clever and have those.  Breakfast includes a choice of coffee and the cappucino was good. The is excellent: 5 minutes from  SM Novella Station, and 10 minutes walk from the Duomo.  Much quieter than other hotels in which I've stayed in Florence. There is a laundromat (coin operated at 3.50E each for washer and dryer) and number of mini-markets close by. Plenty of smaller restaurants at hand (I recommend…

title: Good location in city center
review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. Commuters and tourists come across the constant hustle and bustle of the station before exiting, taking a few steps and stopping amazed in Piazza di Santa Maria Novella. It is impossible not to admire the the square, housing one of the most charming basilicas in Florence. The area has plenty of local spots to taste Tuscan specialties, but don’t stop in the main streets alone; the narrower side streets always ensure satisfaction. The huge Parco Delle Cascine provides a solution to the need for a green area as well as a historic welcome in the form of a bronze statue of King Vittorio Emanuele II riding a horse.

title: Hotel in a very good location!
review: Got a triple room recently.  Check-in was good, staff were helpful,  Parking was tight, but seemed ample enough.  The room was dusty, bed spread had some dirt on it.  Additionally, the sofa bed had a lot of dirt on the mattress.  Room size was decent with no view.  Bathroom was large with shower/tub combo.  Bar was good at happy hour (all drinks 50% off), but expensive otherwise.  Location was close to the train station (~7 min walk) and many restaurants.  Duomo and Uffizi were approx 20 min walk times.  Breakfast was average.

title: Clean and nice
review: Dear Sirs, thanks for the time you spent for your review and thanks also for the kind words about our hotel and our staff.; your opinion it's always important for us and in this case it confirm that our Guests appreciate our efforts. Hoping to see you again at our Hotel. Best regards. Daniele Benelli Assistant Manager

title: Nice cozy hotel at a great location
review: Highly recommend this hotel for those who would like to visit Florence. It is situated near the SMN train station with 5 minutes walk. Many good restaurant near the hotel. You can walk to almost all the attractions in Florence - Duomo, Piazza Signoria, Uffizzi etc.  Hotel room is clean and modern. Exceeding my expectation as it's even better compared to the photos. Breakfast is good.  The only bad point is the reception is very very busy and u need to wait a while for ur turn be it check in or any information needed. Something that could be improved.

title: Would stay here again
review: At first many thanks for your nice review which is really important for us; thanks also for your note about our reception but normally, in high season there are 3 or 4 persons on duty for check in, check out and concierge. Hoping to welcome you again at the Grand Hotel Adriatico, please accept all our best regards.    Daniele Benelli     Assistant Manager

title: Best Western in Europe is Higher End
review: Stayed in the hotel for 3 nights in October 2013. This is our four stay in this hotel.Generally with a car ,this time came with a train.Very pleasant hotel,excellent breakfast. The staff at the reception desk was very helpful and willing to help and we would like especially mention Alessia who answered all our questions. The only complain we have is about the WI FI. We have been told they will solve it at the beginning of 2014....

title: Very good hotel, but no WiFi!
review: Many thanks for the time spent for theis review and many thanks also for the very nice review which is really important for us. Hoping to welcome you again at the grand Hotel Adriatico, please accept all our best regards.     Daniele Benelli      Assistant Manager

title: Nice rooms
review: I didn't know the hotel my travel agent booked me in was a Best Western until I arrived (was a last minute holiday). The rooms were incredibly clean and the only thing I would complain about was the scent they sprayed in the guestroom that was incredibly over powering.  The room was very clean and well appointed, the twin sized bed made me feel like I was in my university dorm room.  Since Florence is compact and walkable I don't think there's too many hotels that can be considered inconvenient.  This hotel was walking distance from the central station, lots of restaurants and cafes close by as well.  The next time I go back to Florence I would probably stay closer to the Duomo since it would probably be more convenient.  The internet connection had to be paid at front desk. If…

title: Room ok, location good for train station no Wifi at all not for business purposes
review: Many thanks for the time spent for this review which is really important for us. Thanks a lot for the kind words and I hope to welcome you again here at the Best Western Grand Hotel Adriatico. Best regards, Daniele Benelli Assistant Manager

title: Nice but lacks the value for the price
review: We just had a most enjoyable break at this hotel, visiting Florence for 4 nights.  I noticed some comments about the location. We were very happy with this, it’s only a 10-15 minute walk from the different attractions, which are not all in one location.  If you don’t like walking, you are not going to like Florence anyway.  People who complain about paying for internet access need to bear in mind that this not the same as installing a home router and it is expensive to cover a building like this.  Whether the cost is covered by increasing the room rate, or just charging the visitors who want to use it, it not free.  The staff were without exception, very friendly and helpful.   One even arranged tickets for us to visit the Uffizi Gallery at a much better price than those online.…

title: Convenient location, hardware needs refurbished
review: Many thanks for your complete and nice review which is very important for us and of course I agree with all your points of view. Also Mr Dario, our  Restaurant Manager thanks you a ot for all the nice words spent. We like to read comments like your as we really work hard to try to make wonderful the stay of our Customers. Hoping to see you again at the Grand Hotel Adriatico, plaase accept our warmest regards.     Daniele Benelli     Assistant Manager

title: Over-priced, No internet (without paying)
review: For the life of me I can't imagine spending the amount of money we did for a location not central enough. That aside, no WIFI. The only available WIFI was for 12,90 Euro a day and you had to sit in the bar or lobby to get reception. Breakfast was typical and so so. The bar area too small and Sergio needs to get a personality. Plus they could have a better liquor selection. No separate concierge serve requiring one to wait in line for a counter person for help and they are somewhat friendly. The room was magnificent, quiet and very clean.

title: A Good Chain Hotel
review: Location:  The hotel has given very clear instructions walking from SMN station.  5-min walk. through narrow streets with a mix of shops , feel relatively safe though not very pleasant  and 8 mins walk to the river.  Many restaurants around the hotel. there's a shop selling fruits and drink two doors up, very reasonable price.  Room:  Small yet serviceable.  Firm mattress.  on 6th floor, but the elevator is a bit old and door didn't shut tight.  we never encounter any mechanical troubles with the elevator though. You can call for tea/coffee making amenities.  It is not in the room. bath room lack of counter space.  Very large towel, one pink and one blue to distinguish. forgot to take pic.  Breakfast:  it was included.  Spread is limited yet sufficient, varieties are same every…

title: Great location
review: We stayed at the Adriatico in Florence for 2 nights.  It was within walking distance to many of the attractions that we experienced.  The buffet breakfast was better than others that we experienced.  There is a Laundromat right next store and an ATM (Bancomat) right in the same block to the right of the hotel entrance. It was clean and comfortable and the staff was very accommodating.  We would stay there again.

title: Really nice room for Europe, great space, comforts of home and walking distance to the piazza
review: Thanks for your kind comment shared with the Tripadvisor World. I'm glad to read you appreciated our hotel and all our services and we always try to give our best to our "guests" and we are proud when this is appreciated. Hoping to welcome you again at the Grand Hotel Adriatico. Daniele Benelli Assistant Manager

title: Clean and spacious rooms
review: My husband and I stayed at this hotel for 3 nights. The hotel is located at a 5-7 min walk from Santa Maria Novella Station and about 10-15 mins walk from the Centro Storico where all the main attractions are located. The rooms were decent sized. We had requested for a double bed and were happy when we got a king sized one. The breakfast is also good. The hotel has good restaurants around if you want to catch a meal. There is also a laundromat next door. Only thing is that they did not have free wifi in the hotel though they had chargeable high speed Internet. Would definitely stay here again.

title: Quite pleased with our choice.
review: Thanks a lot for your kind and complete review about our hotel, our position and our town and thanks also for sharing it on this web site.We really like to read that our customers have been satisfied with their stay with us and enjoed our hotel and all our services. Hoping to see you again in Florence at the Grand Hotel Adriatico, please accept our best regards. Daniele Benelli Assistant Manager  ..  .

title: Great hotel and location
review: Very good value, friendly staff, excellent breakfast. Make sure your air conditioning is activated by reception. Ours was turned off when we arrived so our room was very warm and did cool down to a cool temp whilst we were there which was the only real flaw. Unlike a lot of Best Western hotels, WIFI was not free anywhere in the hotel which was also disappointing. Convenient location close to the bus and rail station and 10 mins walk to the Duomo.

title: Trip to florence
review: At first many thanks for the time spent for this review which is really important for us and thanks also for the good review, it's really a good thing for us to see that our hotel and our services are appreciated by our Clients. Hoping to welcome you again at the Grand Hotel Adriatico, please accept all our best regards. Daniele Benelli Assistant Manager

title: Good hotel, but must pay for wifi
review: The hotel is a about 10 minutes walk from most of the central attractions in Florence and is only about 5 minutes from the railway station. You need to be aware when driving to the hotel that Florence has a car congestion charge so to reach the hotel without occurring a charge you need to approach the hotel from the south using the Via Sant'Onofrio.The hotel charges €20 per night for car parking which I suppose isnt too bad for central Florence and there is a tourist tax of €4.50 per person per night. The WiFi was free, although not having a laptop with me I couldnt check the speed.  Our room was very comfortable and the staff on reception changed their initial allocation of twin beds to a kingsize double on request and there was a nice view out over Florence from our room on…

title: Mary and David. 2 night stay
review: Many thanks at first for the time spent for this review and many thanks also for the great review; we are really happy to read that you liked your stay at our Hotel and you liked also all our services. I hope to welcome you again at the Grand Hotel Adriatico. With warm regards. Daniele Benelli Assistant Manager

title: Good value nice hotel.
review: Good, clean and comfortable hotel with more than adequate breakfast.  Florence was so hot but the hotel had air con (that worked) so we were very comfortable. A reasonable price for a hotel that was very central.

title: Florence
review: Thanks a lot for this beautiful review and thanks for sharing it with this website; it's a good thing for us to know that you appreciated our hotel and all our services. makes us understand that we are going in the right direction for customer satisfaction. We hope to welcome you again at the Grand Hotel Adriatico, please accept all our best regards. Daniele Benelli Assistant Manager

title: Good location, safe parking
review: The woman who checked us in was not very helpful.  We had requested a room with two beds and she insisted it was not noted.  I even had emailed back and forth with the hotel regarding this.  Although when we got to our room it really was two beds (even made up separate) they were just touching each other.  Our room was clean and nice and well equipped with nice towels, etc. The initial poor staff interaction was the only poor staff interaction of our 3 day stay.  My daughter had a medical issue and one of the front desk staff (a woman) helped tremendously!  We ended up having to go see a doctor and she really helped set it all up.  I also had an issue with the laundry facility just down the street (it didn't give me back 10 euros in change) and the front desk man (at our hotel)…

title: A comfortable well located hotel
review: Many thanks for your kind review which is really important for us and it's important too to read that you had an excellent stay with us and you appreciate all the services of our Hotel. I really hope to welcome you again at the Grand Hotel Adriatico in your next visit to Florence. Warm regards. Daniele Benelli Assistant Manager

title: Far exceeded expectations
review: Stayed 3 nights in July 2013. Location is great - only few minutes walking from train station, near the river. Less than 15 min by walking to all central places. The design is nice and clean. Breakfast good. Standard room is really tiny, just one step out of the bed and you balk to the wall. Personally me didn't recognized it by photos and was surprized.  If you need space will feel uncomfortable. From window you can see private life of local people because their windows just beside. It's all lirycs. The only concern I met was absence free wifi access in room. There wass internet wire, but it's not applicable for tablet. Wifi in lobby is not free.

title: nice hotel for short stay
review: Many thanks for the time spent for this review and thanks also for the nice words, we enjoy to read that our Clients loved their stay with us. I hope to welcome you again at the Grand Hotel Adriatico. Best regards.    Daniele Benelli     Assistant Manager

title: Back after 7 years - even better now.
review: Like many of you, I spent weeks researching hotels in Florence before making a selection and all properties seem to have their share of great reviews and poor reviews.  I have to say, my expectations here were about average but we were very pleasantly surprised with the hotel.  The location was perfect for us......easy walking distance to the main attraction in Florence without making us feel as though were were staying in the heart of the "tourist" area.  Many great restaurants nearby, a self serve laundry right next to the hotel, and an easy 7 minute walk to the train station. (here's a hint, if I may.  Walk out of the hotel and turn right.  Walk to the corner and turn right on Borgo Ognissanti....walk to the end of the block and on the right hand side stop at B. Ice for a…

title: western comfort in this Italian setting
review: Many thanks for your detailed review and many thanks also for the nice words you spent about our hotel and our services. I'm sorry for the problem you had with the noise made by other Clients but you had to inform us and for sure we helped you in this matter; our reception is open 24 hours and everybody knows how to intervene in this case. We hope to welcome you again at the Grand Hotel Adriatico and please accept all our best regards.   Daniele Benelli   Assistant Manager

title: Great location, shame about the shower!
review: Undoubtedly a very good hotel.Located close to the railway station as well as the river and the bus station. Money exchange counter is right next to the bus station and most of the day tours start from there .Florence is a beautiful small city which we did entirely on foot and loved it. Lots of grocery shops , caffeterias just outside the hotel a big convenience.Beware of the tratoria restaurant though just outside the hotel. its quite expensive althought the foods good .Went for a day trip to THE MALL ( outlet mall for big brands like burburry, gucci, prada,zegna etc ) which is about 25 minutes drive from the hotel..WOULD DEFINATELY RECOMMEND GOING THERE .Amazing bargains . The hotel arranged for the taxi which waited for us at the outlet mall.  A big help as we saw quite a few…

title: Nice hotel in a great city
review: Thanks a lot for this beautiful review and thanks for sharing it with this website; it's a good thing for us to know that you appreciated our hotel and all our services. makes us understand that we are going in the right direction for customer satisfaction. We hope to welcome you again at the Grand Hotel Adriatico, please accept all our best regards.  Daniele Benelli   Assistant Manager

title: A disappointing experience
review: The most helpful receptionist ever and the perfect location to explore whilst not being too far into the city to make travel hard. No good views as you're in the city and our shower was rubbish but bed comfy, breakfast good and included in the price and hotel was clean.

title: Convenient, Comfortable and Affordable
review: This hotel is a 5-10 minute walk from the Santa Maria Novella Train Station.  The rooms were bigger compared to a hotel we stayed at in Rome.  The cupboard space was bigger so we were able to store our suitcases better.  This room came with a tub however the tub wasn't fully enclosed so we had to be careful when showering not to splash too much water on the ground.  Cleanliness was good in the room and in the hotel.  There were 2 sets of elevator areas.  Breakfast was good, the kitchen staff was very attentive.  We noticed they had a sign that said they had food available for guests with celiac disease.  Our only negative for this hotel was the internet.  Each guest room is allowed one card which provides them with a user name and password to logon to the internet per 24 hour…

title: Convenient and Comfortable
review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. title: Clean and comfortable
review: The hotel is approximately a fifteen minute walk from the central train station and the Santa Maria di Novella Church. From the hotel we walked five minutes to the River Arno and then along the river (another ten minutes of good sites) to the major sites of Florence. We felt very comfortable walking away from the river along the many narrow streets, finding special shops off the usual beaten track--just head back to the river and you'll get your bearings. The hotel is very clean, safe, quiet and the staff is very helpful. The wide variety of food available for breakfast was served in a large, bright and comfortable room. This is one of the few hotels in Florence within my price range which had accessible parking. I've stayed at another four star hotel of the same chain in…

title: A clean, comfortable hotel in walking distance to major attractions.
review: Many thanks at first for the time spent for this review and many thanks also for the great review; we are really happy to read that you liked your stay at our Hotel and you liked also all our services. I hope to welcome you again at the Grand Hotel Adriatico. With warm regards.   Daniele Benelli Assistant manager

title: Great Location
review: We stayed at the Grand Adriatico for 3 nights on our honeymoon in May.  We were upgraded to a suite which was very nice, clean and appeared to be recently updated.  Note that there is no free wi-fi but a wi-fi area (none in the rooms) which is very expensive and inconvenient.  The area is close to the train station which is convenient. We found that Florence was very walkable.  Even though the hotel was not in the greatest area, it was very easy to get to the attractions.  Front desk service was not great but OK. We didn't really use them for much.  Overall, it was very nice and great for what we needed during our stay.

title: Convenient location.
review: Thanks a lot for the time spent for your review that we consider very important to know the opinion of our customers. It helps us to see how we could improve all our services to make the stay of our customers unforgettable. Hoping to welcome you again at the Grand Hotel Adriatico. With best rergards.         Daniele Benelli     Assistant Manager

title: It's ok but not brilliant
review: We paid $100 euros, plus $20 euros to park our car, and $4 per star/per person tax, so $128 euro total. For the price and location I thought it was great value.  Our room was updated and clean, as was the interior of the hotel.  The water pressure was excellent and the bathroom above average sized for Italy. The room was small but done well, nice! The staff was kind and breakfast was great. Not sure about the other comments on WiFi as we asked for a WiFi password at the desk and were given one with no charge. There was an Ethernet connection in the room no instructions but the helpful staff made how to get connected clear to us. We walked into the historic city center and even walked home late at night along the river and felt safe although oddly it seemed safer at night than…

title: Well located hotel in Firenze center
review: Many thanks for your kind review which is really important for us and it's important too to read that you had an excellent stay with us and you appreciate all the services of our Hotel. I really hope to welcome you again at the Grand Hotel Adriatico in your next visit to Florence. Warm regards.     Daniele Benelli     Assistant Manager

title: Not so best
review: Its location is ok, and reasonably quiet, but its a bit of a traipse to the historic centre.  But reception could rustle up a taxi very quickly.  My room was not large but adequate and well maintained with everything working.  The restaurant was good but closed on Sunday without notice. It didn't matter much as there are good restaurants near by, including one about 30 yards along on the other side of the road.  The staff at reception varied from the charming and helpful, through pleasant and efficient, to quite a good imitation of Basil Fawlty.  The hotel is popular with coach tours and the breakfast room can get crowded.  The breakfast buffet is quite ok and well stocked but crammed up into a corner (and it has a toaster which is particularly ineffective even by the usual…

title: trip to Toscany
review: The location of the hotel is good.  The rooms are small, although we took a deluxe, and as it was located in a corner of the building, we didn't get much day light.  The air conditioning of the room didn't work and was making a lot of noise.  For the rest, the hotel was ok, but nothing special.

title: central florence hotel
review: During a recent trip to Italy in April 2013 this was one of 4 hotels during our tour. This hotel is centrally located, clean and comfortable.  As a solo traveler, the room was small ,twin bed, but comfortable. Close to restaurants.

title: Good Location, but nothing Special
review: Many thanks for your kind review and many thanks for the time spent to write it. Itìs a good think for us to read that you appreciate our hotel and the services offered;  we will be glad to welcome you again at the Grand Hotel Adriatico. With best regards      Daniele Benelli    Assistant Manager

title: Great place
review: The hotel is well placed near the station and is a very pleasant hotel. Overall good service and most staff are very helpful and their English is a lot better than my Italian. Breakfasts were ok a good selection but just missed being excellent. The restaurant was passable but there are many better alternatives near by if you looked. A good hotel that just misses being excellent, but good value when you get one of their deals.

title: for the price hard to beat
review: Thanks a lot for your nice review which is really important for us, It's nice to see that you appreciated our hotel and our services and I hope to welcome you again at the Grand Hotel Adriatico. With best regards.        Daniele Benelli     Assistant Manager

title: Wonderful stay in Florence, Italy
review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. title: Great Location
review: Wonderful hotel in Florence, Italy. Staff was top notch and so very helpful to those who don't speak Italian. The location was excellent for walking to many of Florence sights. Only 5 minutes to the train station for our rides to visit other cities. Our room was cleaned every day and was good sized for many of the Italian hotel options. We stayed one night in a hotel in Rome and it was so tiny. The beds and pillows were a little on the hard side, but we were told that is what to expect all over Italy. Breakfast was excellent and offered so many choices. The only negative was a $20 parking fee per night.

title: Great Hotel near the station within reach of old town
review: Thanks a lot for the time spent for your review, really important for us and thanks also for the nice comment. We charge Euro 20,00 per day for our parking which cost 30%-40%  less than a private garage but if you book a superior room (or higher category) it will included in the room rate. Hoping to welcome you again at the Grand Hotel Adriatico, please accept our best regards. Daniele Benelli     Assistanr Manager

title: Decent hotel near SMN train station
review: This hotel is a great value for its location, breakfast (better than most) and its proximity to the train station. The rooms were modern, spacious (for Italy standards) and the prices reasonable...within walking distance to everything.

title: Tidy
review: Many thanks for your wonderful review, we are really glad when our Clients had a good time at our Hotel and appreciate all our services. We hope to welcome you again at the Grand Hotel Adriatico. With best regards    Daniele Benelli    Assistant Manager

title: Fantastico Adriatico!!!
review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. Commuters and tourists come across the constant hustle and bustle of the station before exiting, taking a few steps and stopping amazed in Piazza di Santa Maria Novella. It is impossible not to admire the the square, housing one of the most charming basilicas in Florence. The area has plenty of local spots to taste Tuscan specialties, but don’t stop in the main streets alone; the narrower side streets always ensure satisfaction. The huge Parco Delle Cascine provides a solution to the need for a green area as well as a historic welcome in the form of a bronze statue of King Vittorio Emanuele II riding a horse.

title: very good!
review: Just returned from 10 days in Florence (Firenze) staying at the above hotel. Could not fault any aspect whatsoever - Staff were friendly and helpful, breakfast was plentiful, room cleaned and linen changed every day.  Tour was arranged through the hotel, visit to Pisa, coach picked us up outside, all very easy.  Fantastic restaurant opposite named MASO, we ate there nearly every evening. Plenty of choice and reasonably priced. Hotel is right in centre, only a few minutes from Shops, Duomo or Ponte Vecchio. All in all - FANTASTICO

title: Location, Location, Location
review: Many thanks for this good review which is really important for us. We love to read that our Clients appreciate our hotel, our services and all our work. I hope to welcome you again, with best regards.     Daniele Benelli     Assistant Manager

title: Delightful
review: i didn't mark 5 just because it takes about 15/20 minutes to get to piazza della signoria. the hotel is near to the central station: it means that you can walk with your luggage, and this is good, but it also means, like all the place near to a railway station, that the district is not so nice. this is the only thingh i can complain. the hotel is very nice!

title: Wonderful Service & Comfortable Rooms
review: Thanks a lot for your review which is really important for us and thanks also for the nice words you spent about us. The only thing I don't agree with you is the distance from Piazza della Signoria which is really 10-15 minutes walking from our hotel. Best regards.    Daniele Benelli      Assistant Manager

title: Excellent Location and Great Service
review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. title: A Nice weeek end in Florence
review: We have visited Florence a few times, but never stayed at the Grand Hotel Adriatico before.  However, it is now on our list of prime locations to stay while visiting this beautiful city.  This time, we had were accompanied by a friend, so we stayed in a junior suite.  The room was beautiful, well equipped and tastefully decorated.  Our service at check-in was very smooth and the clerk very helpful.  We had a vehicle and could park it in the small carpark behind the hotel.  (The website says there is a charge for this.)  There are only a few spaces, so first come, first served.  If there is no room here, a parking garage is very close, just around the corner.  If you want to be really close to all the attractions, this is the place to be.  It is an easy walk to the Ponte Vecchio,…

title: Quiet, nice room, great service, excellent location
review: Many thanks for the tme spent for your review and for the nice words concerning your stay at our Hotel. I hope to welcome you again in Florence and at our hotel.  With best regards.    Daniele Benelli    Assistant Manager

title: FLORENCE VISIT
review: Hi! Just wanted to share with you the wonderful staying in Florence, at Best Western Grand Hotel Adriatico. Very comfortable room,in a strategic area, in a 5 minute walking distance from Train Station Santa Maria Novella,lots of facilities around,few yards to walk right above the river ....Excellent!

title: Good Hotel Good Location
review: It's really a pleasure for our staff and me to read a review like your; it's important for us to know your impressions and your minds. Many thanks for the nice words and I hope to see you again at our hotel.  With best regards.     Daniele Benelli    Assistant Manager

title: a nice hotel
review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. title: Good location in the middle of Old Florence
review: it was our second hotel during grand northern tour, i liked the hotel he had a nice breakfeast buffet, the room was bigger than rome hotels, , the elevator is so small that u barely enter with your luggage,it is location is very good

title: Great location and service
review: Many thanks for your good review, it's nice for us to read that you had a nice stay with us and that you appreciated our services. We inform you that we have 3 elevators available in our hotel, one for a maximum of 14 persons and other 2 for a maximum of 6 persons each. With best regards.    Daniele Benelli    Assistant Manager

title: Cosy hotel in the heart of Florence
review: Location good. Room was large by European standards.Hardwood floors free Wi-Fi for 40 minutes.  There was a safe in the room which was a nice touch. Staff was nice and helpfull. Room was well furnished. Breakfast was good.

title: Worst Reception I have ever experienced
review: Dear Sirs, Thanks a lot for your nice review which is really important for us. I hope to welcome you again at our hotel.  With best regards.    Daniele Benelli   Assistant Manager

title: Nil for customer service
review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. Commuters and tourists come across the constant hustle and bustle of the station before exiting, taking a few steps and stopping amazed in Piazza di Santa Maria Novella. title: Great Find
review: Its never a good start when you walk into a hotel and the recepionist looks as if the last thing she wants to see is another tourist. Within twenty seconds or so it was obvious that we weren't expected and there was much jabbering about our booking going on behind the screen in reception. We were told there was a problem with the booking (through Voyage Prive), that it was the hotels fault not ours or the agents, and they were trying to sort it out. A few minutes later they found a room for us and we were given the key and a key card with the room number on it and our check out date five days hence. As soon as we got to the room I realised it was a basic room and not the superior room we had booked and paid for over three months before. I returned to reception and asked them to…

title: Great staff, great hotel
review: Dear Sir,  Thanks for the time you spent for this review which is really important for us; I don’t agree with the description you wrote as it’s true that you were an inaspected Client (as we told you somehow our booking office made a mistake with your booking) but immediatly we assured you that we were able to find a solution. In a couple of minutes we found a standard room and I personally explaned to you that this was only for one night, the first one of your stay with us (there were no superiors or better rooms available at your arrival being the hotel fully booked) and that we were able to change it the day after upgrading you in a “junior suite”.   The day after I explaned to you that you could leave your luggage ready in the old room as we were able to move it in the new accomodation but you preffered to stay there and wait till the other room was ready. Due to our previous mistake we assigned you without any extra charge , a “junior suite” instead of the superior room as reserved. In only 45 minutes our made finished to prepare the new “junior suite” and you moved there with your satisfaction. When you came down you thank me for the assistance and you asked for a compensation “demanding” 2 meals at our restaurant. I tried to explain you that in order to compansate our mistake we had given you  a “junior suite” instead of a superior and offering you an “aperitif” at our bar. At this time you became angry telling me to forget it. I can assure you that when, very seldom, we make a mistake we are already ready to give compensation to our Guests but it must be a “fair compensation” which is two nights in a junior suite against staying in a standard room instead of a superior room for one night plus an aperitif for two.  With best regards. Daniele Benelli Front Office Manager

title: Comfortable an clean hotel, close to the center  (15 min.)
review: We spent one might here because it was a few doors down from our car rental.  Wished we had knowned about it when we first started planning our trip to Florence.  We walked in and got a rate of 80 euros.  The location is close to the train station and a short walk to the center of Florence.  Our room was beautiful, cool, and comfortable.  I loved the pink and blue towels in the bathroom.  The service was great.  The reception people were extremely helpful to us and other guests.  The breakfast had a large variety of very tasty food.  The breakfast room was very elegant compared to other places we stayed in Italy.

title: Excellent Hotel
review: Thanks a lot for the description you gave about our hotel, for us is fantastic to see that you liked our rooms, aour breakfast and all our services. I hope to welcome you again in florence at our hotel. Warm regards.     Daniele Benelli Assistant Manager

title: Great service from the staff
review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. title: Well situated very good hotel with secure parking
review: I ended up at this hotel quite by accident, but if I ever get to return to Florence, this is definitely where I will stay. I was travelling solo and felt safe and comfortable at this hotel.   The hotel is walking distance from the train station, and the rooms are clean and comfortable. The finishes in the bathroom were very nice, and gave the room a high-end feel. In the morning, there is a quite a nice breakfast served, which is included with the room.   The best part, however, was the staff. Everyone was really helpful. The night that I arrived, the woman working at the desk drew on a map for me to show me exactly where we were located, and she also marked the location of several small, casual restaurants that I could walk to and would be comfortable in for a solo dinner. She…

title: Fantastic hotel
review: We stay here every year. The bedroom and bathroom are excellent with good lighting, comfortable bed, desk, chairs (2) fridge and very good shower over bath. You can request tea/coffee making equipment. There is a pillow menu. The iron/ironing board I borrowed was also very good. We use the secure car park which is very important. As the internet is expensive we bring our own 'dongle.' The breakfast is not great unfortunately and the staff could be better trained. The hotel has those awful hard to steal hangers which I loathe. It is an easy walk to Santa Maria Novella and all the good shops as well as the Ponte Vecchio. Superb restaurants nearby and one of the best shoe shops (as shown in hotel showcase). Easy to get to SMN train station. There is a small courtyard garden and a…

title: We made a good choice
review: Thanks a lot for your kind review and also for the suggestions you gave us, of course we will take care about them. I hope to welcome you again at our hotel. Warm regards. Daniele Benelli     Assistant Manager

title: Good Location, excellent staff
review: The hotel is very close to the train station and we walked with our suitcases. It is also walking distance to shops, restaurants, the Ponte Vecchio and other attaractions. Staff were helpful and polite. The room was beautifully clean and well appointed with a large comfortable bed. The bathroom was really nice with a bath tub and shower and plenty of towels. The attached restaurant is very nice with great food reasonably priced. We were very happy.

title: Good hotel on the edge of the Old Town
review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. title: Good location, typical Itallian shabby chic.....
review: We stayed for 4 nights in mid August. Very nice hotel, clean and tidy with helpful, friendly reception staff. Breakfast was good with a choice of cereals, egg & bacon, cold meats and fruit (or a bit of every thing if you're like me!  BUT no full English breakfast. The hotel has a small bar with happy hour half price drinks (for 2 hours 5 - 7pm). A nice place to wind down after a hot day walking round Florence, which is lovely. Drinks always served with a bowl of peanuts and crisps. An older gentleman runs this bar and we found him always polite and courteous. We used the hotel restaurant once but thought the meal choice limited. We both had Salmon which was very good. No problem with the food quality. The hotel is off a side street so no views, but a good location. Most of the…

title: No wifi in the room.. Only 40 minutes free and The conexion has to be in the lobby.. Only that.
review: Many thanks for your kind review, it's very important for us to see that you liked our hotel, all our staff and also all our services. We hope to welcome you again at our hotel. Best regards. Daniele Benelli    Assistant Manager

title: "LOCATION IS KEY"
review: Stayed for three nights on the 1st floor room 108 with balcony. Terrible view but we didn't mind. The room was clean and had a good sized bed. The bathroom was very impressive with a good shower and plenty of towels and gels etc. Sheets were changed every day. Overall the hotel is a bit tired but is typical Itallian and what we expected. We slept really well despite the thin walls but we were lucky as our neighbours were quiet. The biggest letdown is the breakfast. There is nothing for British guests. Tinned fruit in syrup is unacceptable when the market 5 minutes away sells lovely fresh fruit. The fruit juice is terrible, mainly water. No cooked to order food was offered just some over cooked scrambled eggs and bacon, score two out of ten. Staff were friendly enough. Fantastic…

title: Convenient Location and good value.
review: No wifi in the room only 40 minutes free And The conexion had to be in the lobby. Location excellent, near to every important place in florence The service was good and The room siize was good and was clean. My only complaint would be the wifi needed if you will stay more than 3 days

title: Convenient for the station....close to the centre..within budget!
review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. title: No wifi otherwise excellent
review: Conveniently located within walking distance of the train and coach terminal, we selected the Grand Hotel Adriatica for its availability, location and reasonable cost.  Although externally fairly drab and not very aesthetically appealing, you get what you pay for.  We were able to get a couple of rooms close together for the four of us as a family on the same floor and they were practical and functional with an unimpeded view over the neighbouring Florence rooftop vista from the rear of the hotel.  Large comfortable beds, silent air conditioning and blackout curtains that actually worked, all ensured a great night’s sleep.  The satellite TV service was nothing to write home about, but hey…we were on holiday.  This appears to be a high standard three star hotel as opposed to a…

title: Excellent Hotel in Great Location
review: Dear Sirs, at first I would like to thank you for your detailed review about your stay in our hotel, it's a good think to see that all our efforts are appreciate by our Guests. Hoping to see you again at our hotel please accept our warmest regards.   Daniele Benelli    Assistant Manager

title: Nothing special..
review: The reception area is a bit dog earred so we were not expecting too much... However the room was pretty smart, clean, comfortable and quiet. Plus the breakfast area included a garden which we liked.  It is in a good location and at 100€ per night it represents good value relative to a lot of alternatives.

title: Reasonable room, expensive internet and BAD service
review: Many thanks for your kind review, for us it's important to know your opinion to try to improve all our services. Best Regards.     Daniele Benelli    Assistant Manager

title: Well situated

title: Ok but HOT room
review: To be honest all you need in Florence is a clean, safe, and well situated hotel as you should be out sight seeing and eating gelato all day !.  This hotel fits the bill perfectly.  It's a pleasant 7-10 minute walk to the center of town.  Breakfast is standard fare but a good start to the day.

title: freezing room in the middle of july
review: Dear Sirs, many thanks for your review and many thanks also for the nice words; it's a good thing for use to read that our Guests had a great time in Florence and in our Hotel too. Hoping to see you again at the Best Western Grand Hotel Adriatico.   Best regards. Daniele Benelli   Assistant Manager

title: 2 nights in Florence
review: Like other reviews state,ok location,a couple great restaurants in the neighborhood,especiallythe pizza across the street. Next door to Hertz, so handy for car rental. Next door to a laundromat on the other side, also handy.  The big down side was the A/C located in the ceiling. the intake was near the door to the room, the outlet in the ceiling near the door. The cool air would come out and get sucked right back into the intake instead of cooling the room. The only way to overcome the stifling conditions was to move the bed against the door to the entry way/near the bathroom to get a bit of cool air. Overall, an ok hotel, nothing special.

title: Convenient Hotel
review: Walls were thin. AC was bad and icy and the room was freezing and we couldn't control it or turn it off. NO free internet. u get 40 minutes for 5 euros!!! too expensive.  on the other hand, it was close to train station, and florence is not that big and can be seen all on foot.  the room was clean and newly renovated.

title: Wonderful Hotel
review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace.
